mapper.select:
select relname as tableName , description from pg_description join pg_class on pg_description.objoid = pg_class.oid where objsubid = 0
and relname like concat(#{tableNamePrefix}, '%')
order by relname

select c.relname as tableName , a.attname as columnName , t.typname as typeName , case when t.typname in ('varchar', 'bpchar') then a.atttypmod - 4 when t.typname = 'numeric' then (a.atttypmod >> 16) & 65535 else null end::text as length , pgd.description from pg_attribute a join pg_class c on a.attrelid = c.oid join pg_type t on a.atttypid = t.oid left outer join pg_description pgd on a.attrelid = pgd.objoid and a.attnum = pgd.objsubid where c.relname = #{tableName} and a.attnum > 0 and not a.attisdropped order by a.attnum

select c.relname as tableName , a.attname as columnName , con.contype as keyType , rc.relname || '.' || ra.attname as ref from pg_attribute a join pg_class c on a.attrelid = c.oid join pg_constraint con on con.conrelid = c.oid and (a.attnum = any(con.conkey)) left outer join pg_class rc on con.confrelid = rc.oid left outer join pg_attribute ra on ra.attrelid = rc.oid and ra.attnum = any(con.confkey) where c.relname = #{tableName} and a.attnum > 0 and not a.attisdropped

select sequence_schema as schemaName , sequence_name as sequenceName , start_value::text as startValue , maximum_value::text as maxValue , increment::text , cycle_option as cycle from information_schema.sequences order by sequence_schema asc , sequence_name asc
